channel.title: Soil on Here's the Dill
channel.description: Recent content in Soil on Here's the Dill

item.title: New Article: The Scary Seed
item.description: Hi Everyone! My latest article is an overview of how to sow seeds. So if you’re like me and are a little intimidated by seeds, then this is the read for you. In it, you’ll learn the basics of what seeds need in order to survive. Happy planting!
